name: Site-Sonar
author: Technalab

sections.description:
Plugin allows monitoring and sniffing users in real-time.
It is not alternative to Google Analytics but it can fill the gap of informations.

Related Links:

  • Plugin Homepage
  • Changelog
  • Support Forum

License

Plugin is free for everyone! Since it’s released under the GPL, you can use it free of charge on your personal or commercial blog.
Windows Client is also free of charge since is in ALFA or BETA state. After final release will be one-time small cost without any monthly costs like competitions have. People who help me test and brings some nice ideas for sure will obtain full license for free.
sections.installation:
1. Upload site-sonar directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Setup passworn in the Site Sonar menu.
  4. Install Windows Client
sections.faq:
What are requirements ?

Plugin: require SQLITE or PDO_SQLITE modules.
Windows Client: require Windows + Framework.NET 3.5

ERROR: You have not met a requirement of this plugin. SQLITE or PDO_SQLITE PHP module is required

You need Install SQLITE or PDO_SQLITE module on your server.

ERROR: Directory \xxx\xxx\xxx is not writable.

Use your favorite SSH or FTP client and set this directory writable for all users.
